entities.description: Classification of respondents based on their race.
Individuals involved in offenses, characterized based on various attributes such as race.
The raw frequency count of the respondents without applying any weighting.
The total number of respondent cases in the survey.
Classification of offenders based on their race.

relationships.description: Relates offenders to their racial classification.
Indicates the raw frequency count of offenders in the survey.
Indicates the total number of respondent cases in the survey.
Indicates the racial classification of offenders.
